ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] My account
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh. I know! At least I ve never been accused of it. I have been accused of being a twink, which is almost as bad. I was like If I was a twink do you think I
ygData.messageBody:
Heh. I know!
At least I've never been accused of it. I have been accused of being a twink, which is almost as bad. I was like "If I was a twink do you think I would be wearing cloth sandals?".
To put that in context I complained when someone in group was ninjalooting (with split off) and that I would like to loot every now and then. They told me that I didn't need the money because I was obviously a twink (because I had a green silken drape which I had scrounged money together to buy-- before there was a bazaar). Needless to say I was more than a bit ticked.
luv,
-Su


======= At 2005-06-01, 14:03:00 you wrote: =======

>The problem is, calling someone an E-bay toon has become like the greatest insult anyone can come up with in EQ. Try calling someone who has been playing for a long time and did acquire their stuff legitimately an E-bayer and see what kind of reaction you get. It's not pretty.
>
>
>Wulfric
